channel.title: Make utorrent faster?
channel.description: For every damn torrent i try to download it takes usually 2 days for a 300mb file to download, I have fast downloads for everything except torrents, Can anyone help?

item.title: Make utorrent faster?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

It’s better to change the port. I can be wrong, but isn’t the port you are currently using the standard one? Don’t quote me on this, but I’ve read somewhere that the standard one is blacklisted quite a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Make utorrent faster?
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

theres a maxhalfopen setting somewhere in advanced that is set to 8 I think on default, if you set it to 50, its faster.

then it would be the peers and seeds(the amount and speed, make sure theres an empty line between trackers)

item.title: Make utorrent faster?
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

It really depends on seeders as well.I remember from demonoid I usaully got like 15kb/s or so…

Now I get around 100kb/s atleast,while my brother gets 400kb/s and higher.Gotta get some invite to private torrent sites.

Read full topic

item.title: Make utorrent faster?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

  1. Get a dedi at your house running ubuntu
  2. get a cat6 or fiber cable too hook it up
  3. set it in a DMZ
  4. Install uTorrent.

Now you will get downloads at 1.5/2x your normal speeds.

(For some reason, dedi hardware can suck stuff out of the internet)

Read full topic

item.title: Make utorrent faster?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

It really depends on the seeders as well. Depending on where you get the torrent from, you can find some real douchebags who “hit and run”.

I honestly had the same problem as you; tried everything and still got no results.
Then I switched over to Verizon’s FiOs (15mb down/5 up) along with using good torrent communities, and now I get speeds up to 2.3mb/s on torrents.

It’s just a huge array of various factors really. I never fixed the problem, only my new router did.

Read full topic

item.title: Make utorrent faster?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Did, and im still getting only 15kbs a sec, Im going to do ipconfig and see if my ip changed though.

EDIT: its already forwarded on 43594 (lol) since it was already added.

EDIT: I followed a guide on youtube and it went from 14 days to about 2 hours, 100-110kb a sec, not sure if thats good, any way to chug the most out of what i have?

Read full topic
